title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 603.2 - All vehicles subject to inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 603.2 - All vehicles subject to inspection

State Regulations

Before using any portion of the facility, all vehicles shall
be subject to inspection when, in the opinion of the bridge employee then in
charge, such inspection shall be deemed necessary to determine whether such use
would be in violation of this Chapter, and if in the sole and exclusive
judgment of the bridge employee in charge a vehicle is determined to be unsafe
then the transportation of such vehicle shall be prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
603.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
